TopicTitle: Way to edit kerbal back into my carrer

Articles.Content:
Recently a parachute failure in my career save caused jeb, the almighty, and three other tourists to be killed and my game crashed which meant i couldn't restart at launch.

I don't care about the tourists but is there any way to get jeb back, i didn't have the respawn kerbals option on when he died but i have it on now, should i wait or is there something i can do in the permissions to save him?

If not,

RIP Jebediah Kerman -much love ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:48:07Z" title="07/04/2021 07:48  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**
or just change dead to available in the save file. if you search rooster in the file, jeb should be the first entry.

[closed]

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-04T19:47:43Z" title="07/04/2021 07:47  PM" data-short="3 yr">July 4, 2021</time> by benjiful9000**

Do to some weird bug, my Munar station with 9 kerbals, including the original 3 vanished. All 9 KIA. 

What I did was opened up the save file, changed state from "dead" to "available" but I also removed the last flight (13=die), and changed flight = 12. Otherwise, you lose his experience.
